sentences.sentence: "You won't get away with this," he said with unexpected bravado.
sentences.translation: “你逃脱不了的,”他带着出人意料的假自信说道。

sentences.sentence: As a footnote, I should add that there was one point on which his bravado was more than justified.
sentences.translation: 作为补充说明，我应该再加一点，他表现得过于逞强。
那种虚张声势的作用正在逐渐消失。
